EngageManifest.Title: Folio
EngageManifest.Description:
Displays slide at 100% width of image used.

This template features title and description (content) on top of the image selected with a semi-transparent black background.

This template is designed especially for Engage:Folio, but can be used with any skin. The total width of the slide area is based on the width of the image choosen.
